refnamediv.refname: RFC CDK #17: Field in AtomType for hybridization of atom

refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para:
The addition of a field for the hybridization of an atom, implemented as an int, and with constants in CDKConstants, like:
SP_HYBRIDIZATION
SP2_HYBRIDIZATION
SP3_HYBRIDIZATION
etc

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: Sometimes it is useful to hard code the hybridization of an atom. SMILES, e.g. defines the hybridization in case lower case symbols are used, as in c1ccccc1 (cited from SMILES homepage: "The full SMILES language allows sp2-hybridized atoms to be indicated by writing the atomic symbol in lower case.").
